response.overview: “Round & Round” is an engrossing fly on the wall style documentary, offering a peek into life as a roller derby player in Chicago. Stellar cinematography and sharp editing, by Simeon Pratt and Talia Pasqua respectively, make this an extremely enjoyable watch. It’s the kind of thing that leaves you feeling motivated—not motivated to start rollerskating necessarily, but to the find your community and your place.
response.title: Round & Round
